contentrichtext.text: '''Koresh''' is a [[Hebrew language|Hebrew]] name corresponding to the [[English language|anglicised]] name [[Cyrus (name)|Cyrus]] (commonly referring to [[Cyrus the Great]]). It can also mean [[sun]] (in Old Persian). It can also refer to the following people: *[[Cyrus Teed]], called "Koresh," a 19th century spiritualist. *[[David Koresh]], leader of the [[Branch Davidian]] religious group who died along with 74 followers in a fiery blaze at their church in Waco, Texas after a 51-day standoff with the FBI. *and also [[Köräş]], Tatar wrestling *and also Russian slang ''кореш'', that means ''old friend'' {{disambig}}
